Flub.Name: Scale
Flub.Description: The scale of the noise. Higher values create larger, less detailed shapes. Lower values create noisier, highly detailed shapes.

Flub.Name: Octaves
Flub.Description: The number of noise octaves. Higher values create more complexity.

Flub.Name: Billowy
Flub.Description: Use for lower, more bulbous shapes.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.

Flub.Name: Warp Frequency
Flub.Description: Frequency of the warp. Higher numbers create stronger warping.

Flub.Name: Warp Amplitude
Flub.Description: The strength of the warping applied to the base noise.

Flub.Name: Warp Octaves
Flub.Description: The complexity of the warping shape.

Flub.Name: Scale X
Flub.Description: The non-uniform scale of the X axis.

Flub.Name: Scale Y
Flub.Description: The non-uniform scale of the Y axis.
